scripts.postinstall: cd frontend/ && npm install && cd ../functions/ && npm install
scripts.start: concurrently --prefix "{name} |" --n 'Frontend ','Functions' -c blue,green "cd frontend/ && npm run start" "cd functions/ && npm run start"
scripts.frontend-start: concurrently --prefix "{name} |" --n 'Frontend' -c blue "cd frontend/ && npm run start"
scripts.frontend-build: concurrently --prefix "{name} |" --n 'Frontend' -c blue "cd frontend/ && npm run build"
scripts.functions-start: concurrently --prefix "{name} |" --n 'Functions' -c green "cd functions/ && npm run start"
scripts.functions-serve: concurrently --prefix "{name} |" --n 'Functions' -c green "cd functions/ && npm run serve"
scripts.functions-build: concurrently --prefix "{name} |" --n 'Functions' -c green "cd functions/ && npm run build"
scripts.functions-deploy: concurrently --prefix "{name} |" --n 'Functions' -c green "cd functions/ && npm run deploy"
